channel.title: All clients lag
channel.description:
Alright so my problem is that whenever I run a client it starts lagging. I've fixed this before with something I had saved on a notepad file. But I've recently formatted my external harddrive before formatting my whole pc so it's not in my external harddrive anymore.
But all i remember is that I had to go into Environment Variables and type something in like dsun.java or something like that, then whenever I'd run the client it would says "DSUN.JAVA (whatever it said): PICKED UP" That helped clients run a whole lot smoother. So can anyone help me on this dilemma?

item.title: All clients lag
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

Get a better computer.

Read full topic

So can anyone help me on this dilemma?
